name: Air Striker: Helicopter
description:
AirStriker: Helicopter is an inspired game of "Sky Force". A lot of Air Plane or Helicopter Shooting games are Top Down View or 3D person view so I created a game that is a 2.5D view Helicopter shooting game.

This is a currently in-development game made for smartphones using Unity Engine. 

DEMO VERSION

CONTROLS:

W to move upward

S to move downward

A to move backward

D to move forward

SPACE to attack

F to use a special weapon if equipped only
